title: HBO's The Outsider Review + Castle Rock: Season Two Final Thoughts
itunes:title: HBO's The Outsider Review + Castle Rock: Season Two Final Thoughts
itunes:subtitle: The Losers return to the Barrens following a lengthy holiday hiatus -- and they've brought a guest. Jenn Adams of The Horror Virgin has tagged along to discuss the grisly crimes behind HBO's The Outsider. Together, they discuss Richard Price...
description:
The Losers return to the Barrens following a lengthy holiday hiatus -- and they've brought a guest. Jenn Adams of The Horror Virgin has tagged along to discuss the grisly crimes behind HBO's The Outsider. Together, they discuss Richard Price's turn into the supernatural, Cynthia Erivo's portrayal of Holly Gibney, and the show's delicate dance with tones. Shortly after, the three head to Castle Rock to close up shop on last year's explosive second season on Hulu. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
